article_title: Religion Is Good For All Of Us, Even Those Who Don't Follow One

article_metadata.description: Religion provides our economy and country with many benefits, so whatever your religious beliefs you gain economically because others practice their religions.
article_metadata.author: Jeffrey Dorfman
